item.title: Measuring UML models - User Guide
item.author: webdev@eclipse-foundation.org (Eclipse Foundation)
item.description: Measuring UML models - User Guide By Freddy Allilaire (INRIA), RÃ©mi Schnekenburger (CEA LIST) May 2007 This user guide explains how to configure and launch the Measuring UML models ATL service in Papyrus. User Guide First step is to create a new transformation configuration, using the Run As button. Thanks to the pop-up menu available on Papyrus transformation, you can create a new transformation configuration. This transformation configuration will contain all necessary parameters for your transformation.
